content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The negotiation did not result in a final agreement on a price. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was offering 850 Euros per month, which was beyond the potential tenant's budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Yi-Nuo Wang, as 7. He was respectful, straightforward, and firm with his requests, which are admirable qualities in a negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no indication of discrimination or offense in the conversation, I have no further comment.
name: Peter Schmidt
